meanings.sent1: She retransmitted the email to make sure everyone received it.
meanings.sent2: The radio station retransmitted the news bulletin for those who missed it earlier.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally retransmitted the same message twice, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The echo in the cave retransmitted his voice, creating an eerie effect.
meanings.sent5: The teacher retransmitted the instructions clearly, ensuring everyone understood.

meanings.sent1: The satellite retransmitted the signal to reach a wider audience.
meanings.sent2: The TV station retransmitted the live event for viewers in different time zones.
meanings.sent3: The parrot retransmitted the words it heard, much to the amusement of the guests.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse retransmitted the distress signal, alerting nearby ships of danger.
meanings.sent5: The internet router retransmitted the data packets to ensure a stable connection.
